_meanings:
A vocative particle
used in addressing persons, and
translateable by ‘oh,’ ‘sir,’ ‘oh,’
‘halloo,’ ‘ah;’ (it drops its final
{%visarga%} before vowels and soft 
consonants); {#kaH ko'tra BoH#} <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; {#aTi Bo#}
{#maharziputra#} <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; it is sometimes 
repeated; {#Bo BoH SaMkaragfhADivAsino#}
{#jAnapadAH#} <ls>Māl. 3</ls> {#Bos#} is said to have,
in addition, the senses of ‘sorrow’
and ‘interrogation’.
